exception: To respond to a custom format, register it as a MIME type first: http://guides.rubyonrails.org/action_controller_overview.html#restful-downloads. If you meant to respond to a variant like :tablet or :phone, not a custom format, be sure to nest your variant response within a format response: format.html { |html| html.tablet { ... } }
